00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <cppunit/TestCase.h>
00022 
00023 #include <rdkcore/serialization/read.h>
00024 #include <rdkcore/serialization/write.h>
00025 
00026 #include "utils.h"
00027     
00028 #include <cppunit/ui/text/TestRunner.h> 
00029 
00030 #include "good_tests.h"
00031 
00032 namespace RDK2 { namespace UnitTest { namespace Serialization {
00033     
00034     using namespace RDK2::Serialization;
00035     using namespace std;
00036 
00043     template<class X>
00044     class SerializationTest1 : public CppUnit::TestCase { 
00045         public: 
00046             X*x; Writer*w; Reader*r; string file; 
00047             
00048             SerializationTest1( std::string name,
00049             X*x, Writer*w, Reader*r, cstr file) : CppUnit::TestCase( name ),
00050                 x(x), w(w), r(r), file(file) {}
00051     
00052             void runTest() {
00053                 string buffer1, buffer2; X x2;
00054                 
00055                 try {
00056                      buffer1 = w->serialize(true,x);     
00057                 } catch(SerializationException e) {
00058                     cerr << e.what() << endl;   
00059                     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Exception during serialization", false);
00060                 }
00061                 
00062                  CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Output is different from file",
00063                         compareToFile(buffer1, file));
00064                 
00065                 try {
00066                      r->deserialize(buffer1, &x2);
00067                 } catch(SerializationException e) {
00068                     cerr << e.what() << endl;   
00069                     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Exception during deserialization", false);
00070                 }
00071                 
00072                 
00073                 try {
00074                     buffer2 = w->serialize(true,&x2);
00075                     if(buffer1!=buffer2) {
00076                         printf("First buffer (first time): '%s'\nSecond Buffer: '%s' (second time)", buffer1.c_str(), buffer2.c_str());
00077                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("deserialization+serialization!=identity",
00078                         buffer1==buffer2);
00079                     }
00080                 } catch(SerializationException e) {
00081                     cerr << e.what() << endl;   
00082                     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Exception during second serialization", false);
00083                 }
00084             }
00085     };
00086 
00087     bool doAllTests(Writer &bw, Reader &br,cstr prefix,cstr suffix) {
00088         CppUnit::TextUi::TestRunner runner;
00089 
00090         runner.addTest(
00091             new SerializationTest1<EmptyClass>
00092             ("case1", new EmptyClass(), &bw, &br, prefix+"emptyclass"+suffix)
00093         );
00094 
00095         runner.addTest(
00096             new SerializationTest1<IntWrapper>
00097             ("case2", new IntWrapper(42), &bw, &br, prefix+"intWrapper"+suffix)
00098         );
00099 
00100         runner.addTest(
00101             new SerializationTest1<Complex1>
00102             ("oneObject-withoutClassname", new Complex1(), &bw, &br, prefix+"complex1"+suffix)
00103         );
00104 
00105         runner.addTest(
00106             new SerializationTest1<Complex2>
00107             ("oneObject-withClasname", new Complex2(), &bw, &br, prefix+"complex2"+suffix)
00108         );
00109 
00110         runner.addTest(
00111             new SerializationTest1<Complex4>
00112             ("Complex4", new Complex4(), &bw, &br, prefix+"complex4"+suffix)
00113         );
00114 
00115         runner.addTest(
00116             new SerializationTest1<Complex6>
00117             ("Complex6", new Complex6(43,44), &bw, &br, prefix+"complex6"+suffix)
00118         );
00119 
00120         runner.addTest(
00121             new SerializationTest1<Complex5>
00122             ("Complex5", new Complex5(), &bw, &br, prefix+"complex5"+suffix)
00123         );
00124 
00125         runner.addTest(
00126             new SerializationTest1<Complex3>
00127             ("Complex3", new Complex3(43,44), &bw, &br, prefix+"complex3"+suffix)
00128         );
00129 
00130         runner.addTest(
00131             new SerializationTest1<Complex7>
00132             ("Complex7", new Complex7(43,44), &bw, &br, prefix+"complex7"+suffix)
00133         );
00134 
00135         runner.addTest(
00136             new SerializationTest1<EmptyArray>
00137             ("EmptyArray", new EmptyArray(), &bw, &br, prefix+"emptyarray"+suffix)
00138         );
00139 
00140         runner.addTest(
00141             new SerializationTest1<VersionTest>
00142             ("VersionTest", new VersionTest(), &bw, &br, prefix+"versiontest"+suffix)
00143         );
00144 
00145         runner.addTest(
00146             new SerializationTest1<EmptyVersion>
00147             ("EmptyVersion", new EmptyVersion(), &bw, &br, prefix+"emptyversion"+suffix)
00148         );
00149 
00150         return runner.run();
00151     }
